header: BRIEF-Google Flights will now deliver fare change information -blog
body:
* ‘Google Flights’ service will now show users when prices are expected to increase for some flights and routes users are interested in

* 'Google Flights' will send user notifications via email letting them know when prices are expected to change - blog Source text: (bit.ly/2dJ3jax) Further company coverage:

header: Investment firm appeals Google, Samsung patent infringement verdict
body:
By Eric M. Johnson A Seattle-area investment firm has said it is entitled to a new patent infringement trial against Google and Samsung because of mistakes a federal judge made that “permeated the entire trial.”

In a brief filed on Thursday with the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit, ContentGuard Holdings Inc, argued that U.S. District Court Judge Rodney Gilstrap of the Eastern District of Texas constructed one of its patent claims too narrowly.

To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2ehqr5b
